user.title: Light Controller Setup
user.description: Configure default settings for the Light Controller. These can be changed later in the integration options.

data_description.default_brightness_pct: Default brightness percentage when not specified in service calls
data_description.default_transition: Default transition time in seconds for light changes

defaults.title: Default Settings
defaults.description: Configure default brightness and transition settings

data_description.default_brightness_pct: Default brightness percentage (1-100%) when not specified in service calls
data_description.default_transition: Default transition time in seconds for smooth light changes

tolerances.title: Verification Tolerances
tolerances.description: Configure how strictly lights are verified. Higher tolerances are more forgiving of minor differences.

data_description.brightness_tolerance: Allowed ± deviation in brightness percentage (e.g., 3 means 47-53% passes for target 50%)
data_description.rgb_tolerance: Allowed ± deviation per RGB color channel (0-255 scale)

retry.title: Retry & Timing Settings
retry.description: Configure retry behavior when lights don't immediately reach target state

data_description.delay_after_send: Seconds to wait after sending commands before checking state
data_description.max_retries: Maximum number of retry attempts before giving up
data_description.max_runtime_seconds: Hard timeout - abort after this many seconds regardless of retries
data_description.use_exponential_backoff: Double the delay after each failed retry (2s → 4s → 8s → ...)
data_description.max_backoff_seconds: Cap on delay when using exponential backoff

data_description.log_success: Write a message to the Home Assistant logbook when lights successfully reach target state
data_description.notify_on_failure: Service to call when lights fail (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone). Leave empty to disable.

add_preset.title: Add New Preset
add_preset.description: Create a new light preset. Presets store light settings and can be activated via service call or button entity.

data_description.name: A unique name for this preset
data_description.entities: Select the lights to include in this preset
data_description.state: Whether lights should be turned on or off
data_description.color_temp_kelvin: Color temperature in Kelvin (leave empty for current)
data_description.transition: Transition time in seconds when activating
data_description.skip_verification: Skip state verification (faster but won't retry on failure)

manage_presets.title: Manage Presets
manage_presets.description: You have {preset_count} preset(s) configured. Select a preset to delete it.

data_description.preset_to_delete: Warning: This action cannot be undone

error.entities_required: At least one entity is required
